name: Up & Up
description:
My first game! Made with PIXI.JS v5 and TypeScript.

Use "A" and "D" to move, use mouse to aim and shoot. Jump as high as you can without falling and hitting enemies! Kill enemies for more points.

Demo video: 

Sometimes it might take very long to load and get stuck at 92%. Try https://up-n-up-game.herokuapp.com/
